LanguageData.Pa_SOFLAM.label: SOFLAM
LanguageData.Pa_SOFLAM.description: Special Operations Forces Lacer Acquisition Marker.
LanguageData.Special_SOFLAM.label: SOFLAM
LanguageData.Special_SOFLAM.description: Special Operations Forces Lacer Acquisition Marker, aka, SOFLAM, a special rangefinding device to designate/locate target using laser guided ordance, included sensor to detect hostile foes automatically.
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_SOFLAM.label: SOFLAM(Minified)
